title: Dallas
description: The attack on police in Dallas, and the response so far. With campaign reporter Scott Detrow, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and campaign reporter Sam Sanders in Dallas. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
